    • RefugeeLogic

      public RefugeeLogic(RefugeeDaoInterface refugeeDAO)

  • Method Details

    • RegisterRefugee

      public Refugee RegisterRefugee(RefugeeRegisterDTO dto) throws NotUniqueException, ValidationException
      Implementation of method used to create a new refugee in the data-tier. This is implemented by creating an empty Refugee-object, and adding all information stored in the DTO to this, by using the set methods specified.
      Specified by:
      RegisterRefugee in interface RefugeeInterface
      Parameters:
      dto - : a Domain Transfer Object containing all relevant attributes needed to create a new Refugee.
      Returns:
      An object representation of the newly created Refugee-entry in the data-tier.
      Throws:
      NotUniqueException
      ValidationException
      See Also:
      • for documentation of set methods.

    • LoginRefugee

      public Refugee LoginRefugee(LoginDTO dto) throws ValidationException
      Implementation of method used to log in an already existing Refugee. This is implemented by creating an empty Refugee-object, and adding the email and password information from the DTO to it. A call is then made to the data-tier to find a refugee with the specified email. If such a refugee is found, it is verified that the password given in the DTO matches the password stored.
      Specified by:
      LoginRefugee in interface RefugeeInterface
      Parameters:
      dto - : A domain transfer object containing the email and password of the refugee trying to log in.
      Returns:
      An object representation of the logged in refugee gotten from the Data-tier.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if any of the validation specified above fails.
